statements: SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data
SELECT id, employee_id, hand_length FROM hand_geometry_data
SELECT employee_id, hand_width, finger_length FROM hand_geometry_data
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE attendance_status='present'
SELECT id, hand_length, finger_width FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY hand_length DESC, finger_width ASC
SELECT id, employee_id, hand_length, hand_width, finger_length, finger_width, attendance_status FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, attendance_status FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_length > 10 AND finger_length < 5;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY employee_id DESC, hand_width ASC;
SELECT AVG(hand_length), MIN(finger_width) FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT id, employee_id, attendance_status FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT employee_id, hand_scan_data FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT hand_scan_data, employee_id FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT id, employee_id FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance ORDER BY date ASC, time_in DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, hand_scan_data FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_scans FROM hand_geometry_data GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT employee_id, date, MIN(time_in) AS first_in, MAX(time_out) AS last_out FROM employee_attendance GROUP BY employee_id, date;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employee_info WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT hand_shape, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_shape = 'Oval';
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_info WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_info
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employee_info WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT employee_id, last_name FROM employee_info WHERE department='HR' AND last_name LIKE '%son%'
SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, a.date, a.clock_in_time, a.clock_out_time FROM employee_info e JOIN employee_attendance a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id
SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.department, d.hand_shape, d.hand_length FROM employee_info e JOIN hand_geometry_data d ON e.employee_id = d.employee_id ORDER BY d.hand_length DESC
SELECT * FROM employee
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employee ORDER BY employee_department DESC
SELECT hand_length, hand_width, finger_length FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_length > 10
SELECT * FROM attendance_trends WHERE trend_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employee WHERE employee_department = 'HR'
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employee WHERE employee_department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, employee_department FROM employee ORDER BY employee_department DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employee;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department, check_in_time FROM employee JOIN employee_attendance ON employee.employee_id = employee_attendance.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_info WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT attendance_id, date, time_in, time_out FROM attendance_record WHERE employee_id = 5;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, shift_start, shift_end FROM employee_schedule WHERE off_days LIKE '%Saturday%';
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_info WHERE supervisor = 'John Smith';
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, date FROM attendance_record ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT hand_shape, attendance_status FROM hand_geometry_data JOIN employee_info ON hand_geometry_data.employee_id = employee_info.employee_id;
SELECT analysis_result FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'quarterly';
